text: A rum runner is a person or ship engaged in the illegal business ofsmuggling alcoholic beverages. Rum Runner may also refer to: *Go-fast boat, a type of boat used for smuggling illicit alcoholic potables *Rum Runner (nightclub), a nightclub in Birmingham, England *Rum Runners or Boulevard du Rhum, a 1971 French-Italian-Spanish adventure film directed by Robert Enrico ==See also== *Rimrunners (disambiguation)
title: Rum Runner (disambiguation)
